ss:Worksheet.ss:Name: Copy of Octopath Traveler 2 community sheet - Job

Cell.Data: Unleash a sword attack on random foes (3/4/5/6) times.
Unleash a powerful polearm attack on a single foe, and have a (25/50/75/100%) chance to deal a critical hit.
Raise your physical attack for (3/5/7/9) turns.

Nullify all positive status effects on a single foe, then unleash a sword attack. The more status effects you nullify, the more potent the attack. (This skill is mistranslated: it removes the warrior's buffs to boost damage from the attack)
Raise your physical defence for (3/5/7/9) turns.
Draw foes' single-target attacks to yourself for 3 turns.
Grant yourself the ability to counter physical damage with a sword attack (2/3/4/5) times. The counterattack reduces the enemy's Shield Points regardless of their weak points.
Unleash an extraordinarily powerful sword attack on a single foe.
Raises the equipping character's physical attack when breaking an enemy. [Grants PATK Up buff after breaking for 2 turns]
Increases the physical strength of the equipping character by 50.
Raises the amount of latent power gained by the equipping character.
Increases the maximum damage that can be dealt by the equipping character to 99,999.
Raise the physical attack of a single ally for (2/4/6/8) turns.
Unleash a powerful physical attack on a single foe, and reduce their Shield Points regardless of their weak points.
Raise the elemental attack of a single ally for (2/4/6/8) turns.
Deal wind-based damage to a single foe.
Move a single ally's next action up (1/2/3/act first) spot.
Unleash a dagger attack on all foes
Cause a curious effect to occur (1/2/3/4) time. The effects can be positive or negative, each BP used triggers an additonal effect.
Extend the reach of a single ally's skills to all for 3 turns. This does not affect divine skills or skills that only affect the user.
Extends the duration of augmenting effects granted by the equipping character by 1 turn
Enables the equipping character to more easily evade enemy attacks
Receive additional JP after battles. (Equipping multiple characters with this skill will have no added effect.)
Slightly fills the target's latent power gauge when the equipping character grants them an augmented effect
Unleash a powerful bow attack on a single foe and receive JP. The more damage you deal, the more JP you receive.
Restore one's own HP and SP, and cure status ailments.
Collect money from a single foe.
Deal fire-based damage to a single foe.
Grant (1/2/3/4) BP to a single ally.
Dodge (1/2/3/4) physical attack/s with a 100% success rate.

Pay money to summon hired help to the battlefield. Mercenary ($150) - Unleash a sword attack on all foes, and raise the physical defense of all allies. Ruffian ($800) - Reduce the physical attack and physical defense of all foes. Thespian ($2000) - Raise the elemental attack of all allies, and restore their SP. Guard ($7000) - Unleash a staff attack on all foes, and delay their actions. Beastling ($15000) - Unleash a physical attack on all foes, and reduce their Shield Points regardless of their weak points. Veteran Soldier ($30000) - Unleash a powerful attack on all foes with various weapons. Foreign Assassin ($50000) - Unleash a powerful dagger attack on all foes, and restore HP and SP to all allies. (Unlock: Beat foreign assassin in Western Merry Hills Pass, Crestlands)
Unleash a non-elemental attack on a single foe and receive leaf coin (money) equivalent to the damage dealt.
Receive additional [10%] money after battles. (Equipping multiple characters with this skill will have no added effect.)
Grants the equipping character 1 BP at the start of battle.
When the equipping character is not near death, otherwise lethal attacks will instead leave them with 1 HP.
Completely fills the equipping character's latent power gauge at the start of battle.
Fireball / Fire Storm / Ignis Ardere (Tier 1/ Tier II / Tier III)
Tier I (Normal): Deal fire-based damage to all foes. Tier II (Advanced Magic): Deal fire-based damage to all foes 2 times. Tier III (Alephan's Wisdom): Deal fire-based damage to all foes 3 times.
Icewind / Blizzard / Glacies Claudere (Tier 1/ Tier II / Tier III)
Tier I (Normal): Deal ice-based damage to all foes. Tier II (Advanced Magic): Deal ice-based damage to all foes 2 times. Tier III (Alephan's Wisdom): Deal ice-based damage to all foes 3 times.
Lightning Bolt / Lightning Blast / Tonitrus Canere (Tier 1/ Tier II / Tier III)

Tier I (Normal): Deal lightning-based damage to all foes. Tier II (Advanced Magic): Deal lightning-based damage to all foes 2 times. Tier III (Alephan's Wisdom): Deal lightning-based damage to all foes 3 times.
Reveal the HP and (1/2/3/5) weak point of a single foe
Grant yourself (2/3/4/5) attribute-raising effects at random (Effects will stack)
Deal either fire-, ice-, or lightning-based damage to random foes (3-5 / 4-6 / 5-7 / 6-8) times.
Boosts the intensity of a single ally's spells 2 times (Default Tier 1 AOE spell becomes Tier 2 spell.)
Greatly boosts the intensity of a single ally's spells 3 times. (Default Tier 1 AOE spell becomes Tier 3 spell.)
Reduces the rate of random encounters. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect)
Augments the equipping character's elemental attack strength by 50.
Gain additional experience from battles. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect) [+10% EXP]
Raises the number of times the equipping character can use more intense spells by 1
Heal Wounds / Heal More / Heavenly Healing (Tier 1/ Tier II / Tier III)
Tier I (Normal): Restore HP to all allies Tier II (Advanced Magic): Restore a great amount of HP to all allies. Tier III (Alephan's Wisdom): Restore a massive amount of HP to all allies.
Inflict light-based damage to a single foe.
Raise the physical and elemental defense of a single ally for (2/4/6/8) turns
Unleash a staff attack on a single foe 2 times, and steal SP equivalent to 10% of the damage dealt
Luminescence / Radiance / Lux Congerere (Tier 1/ Tier II / Tier III)
Tier I (Normal): Deal light-based damage to all foes. Tier II (Advanced Magic): Deal light-based damage to all foes 2 times. Tier III (Alephan's Wisdom): Deal light-based damage to all foes 3 times.
Grant a shield to a single ally, reducing damage taken from the next hit by (50/65/80/100%)
Revive / Revive and Restore / Revive and Rejuvenate (Tier 1/ Tier II / Tier III)
Tier I (Normal): Revive all allies Tier II (Advanced Magic): Revive all allies and restore a great amount of HP. Tier III (Alephan's Wisdom): Revive all allies and restore a massive amount of HP.
Grant a single ally the ability to act again at the end of a turn for 3 turns. Only one additional action can be taken per turn.

Raises the amount of HP restored to the equipping character when healed (This skill may be mistranslated? Seems to increase potency of healing abilities used by the equipping character, even on allies.)
Raises the equipping character's max SP by 50
Increases the party's success rate when attempting to flee (Equipping multiple characters with this skill will have no added effect)
The equipping character will recover 25% of their max HP once per battle upon being incapacitated
Steal an item from a single foe. Odds increase with BP spent.
Attack a single foe twice with a dagger and steal HP equivalent to half of damage dealt.
Unleash a sword attack on a single foe. The sooner your action comes during a turn, the more potent the attack.
Reduce the physical defense of a single foe for (2/4/6/8) turns.
Reduce the physical attack of a single foe for (2/4/6/8) turns.
Attack all foes with a dagger, dealing damage proportional to your speed.
The equipping character has a 50% chance of attacking when using a non-damaging skill
Raise the equipping character's speed by 50
The equipping character has a 50% chance of inflicting an attribute-reducing effect when taking physical damage
Receive additional [50%] EXP and [50%] JP after battles at night (Equipping multiple characters with this skill will have no added effect) [+50% EXP & JP]
Deal heavy lightning damage to a single foe.
Axe attack on a single enemy, and grant yourself positive status effects based on the foe's type for 3 turns.
Unleash a bow attack on a single foe. Otherwise lethal attacks will instead leave the target with 1hp
Raise the critical rate and accuracy of all allies for (2/4/6/8) turns
Cause a single foe to act at the end of the turn for (2/4/6/8) turns.
Nullify (1/2/3/4) of a single foe's augmenting effects
Unleash a powerful bow attack on all foes 3 times.
Gain an [10%] increased chance of attack first in a battle. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect)
Increases the critical of the equipped character by 50.
Raises the chance of encountering rare monsters. (Equipping this skill with multiple characters will have no added effect)
The equipping character has a 50% chance of acting twice when breaking a foe. This will not trigger in succession
Restore HP to or revive a single ally.
Deal ice-based damage to a single foe.
Grant a single ally immunity to status ailments for (2/4/6/8) turns.
Unleash an axe attack on all foes.
Unleash a powerful axe attack on a single foe, and poison them for 2 turns.
For (3/5/7/9) turns, grant HP to a single ally after they perform an action.
Make a single foe weak to poison for (2/4/6/8) turns.
Extend the reach of a single ally's items to affect all for 3 turns.
Restores 30% of the equipping character's max HP and SP upon winning the battle.
Raises the equipping character's max HP by 500.
Restores the equipping character's [20] SP when breaking a foe.
Grants the equipping character immunity to enfeebling effects for 3 turns at the start of battle.
Unleash an attack on all foes with a selected weapon Costs 1 turn to "build" to reuse once skill is performed for the first time.
Cause a single ally to act first for (5/6/7/8) turns from the next turn Costs 2 turn to "build" to reuse once skill is performed for the first time.
Turn all damage dealt to a single foe into critical damage for (4/5/6/7) turns Costs 3 turn to "build" to reuse once skill is performed for the first time.
Unerring Earring x1, Critical Earring x1
Deal the same type of damage as a single foe's exposed elemental weak points (1/2/3/4) time
Fire/Ice/Thunder Soulstone x1 (each), Rainbow Glass Bottle x1
Rainbow Glass Bottle: Chest, Conning Creek: Harbor (South of Canalbrine)
Fill the latent power gauge of all allies
Empowering Lychee x1, Tin Toy x1, Mythical Horn x1
Mythical Horn: Chest: Nameless Village, guarded by NPC; Tin Toy: Complete Partito Ch3, Wellgrove Dept Store
Unleash a highly powerful physical attack on a single foe, and reduce the crafting time of an invention by 1 turn
Soldier's Bow x1, Great Blade x1, Guardian's Axe x1
Great Blade: Soldier in Sai to the bottom right. Guardian's Axe: Can be stolen from soldier in Crackridge blacksmith.
Restore (40/60/80/100%) of a single ally's HP and SP, and grant them (1/2/3/4) BP. Incapacitated allies will also be revived
Scrap Metal x1, Ancient Cog x1, Natural Magnetite x1

Ancient Cog: Roque Island (Factory Worker; mug/entreat); Natural Magnetite: Unfinished Tunnel, Wildlands; Scrap Metal: Clockbank: Industrial District (Factory Worker; Steal/Purchase; next to weapon shop)
The equipping character will act first at the start of battle
Raises the attributes [by 50%] of the equipping character's accessories
Grants the equipping character 2 BP when near death
Raises the physical and elemental defense of the equipping character by 1 for every job skill learned
Charge your attack until the end of the turn, then unleash a powerful sword attack on a single foe. The longer the charge, the more potent the attack.
Rusty Sword: Winterbloom Sword In Stone
SQ: The Sword In The Stone Requires Sturdy Pickaxe (Steal/Buy) from Retired Miner in Oresrush Weapon Shop
Unleash a moderately powerful polearm attack on all foes. The more foes there are, the more potent the attack.
Rusty Spear: Timberain Castle Town Square (Duel/Ambush guard on far West side)
Unleash a dagger attack on random foes at least 3 times. The more foes there are, the more attacks you will unleash on your target.
Rusty Dagger: Shipwreck of the Empress
Requires Ship - SQ: Tropu'hopu Route (The Scent of Commerce) $100,000, Partito in party (Tropu'hopu Shipyard)
Unleash an axe attack on a single foe 2 times. The second strike will be more powerful than the first. The more weak points you have revealed, the more potent the attack.
Rusty Axe: Defeat Boss of Quicksand Gaol West of Sai
Unleash a moderately powerful bow attack on all foes. If you break even one foe, this attack will trigger twice.
Rusty Bow: Defeat Boss of Sinking Ruins South of Nameless Village
Unleash a powerful staff attack on a single foe. The higher your elemental attack, the more potent the attack
Rusty Staff: Seat of the Water Sprite Dungeon east of Flamechurch
Unleash a physical attack on a single foe, then go on the defensive until your next action. The higher your physical defense, the more potent the attack.
Unleash attacks with six different weapons on random foes.
Enables the equipping character to more easily land critical hits on broken foes. [30% increase to crit rate]
Raises damage dealt [by 50%] when the equipping character is at or above max HP.
Restores the equipping character's HP [by 20%] when breaking a foe.
Fills the equipping character's latent power gauge when exploiting an enemy's weak point.
Grant the weapons of all allies an additional fire-based attack for 2/3/4/5 turns.
Grant the weapons of all allies an additional ice-based attack for 2/3/4/5 turns.
Grant the weapons of all allies an additional lightning-based attack for 2/3/4/5 turns.
Grant the weapons of all allies an additional wind-based attack for 2/3/4/5 turns.
For 2/3/4/5 turns, grant SP to all allies after they perform an action
Grant a single ally immunity to enfeebling effects for 2/4/6/8 turns.
Revive and fully restore the HP of all allies, and raise their physical defense and elemental defense for 2 turns. You will not be able to act for 6/5/4/3 turns.
Grant a single ally 2 BP at the start of every turn for 3 turns
Attribute-reducing effects on the equipping character will dissipate twice as quickly
Halves SP required for the equipping character's skills

Bring misfortune upon the foe who renders the equipping character incapacitated. [Causes 1 of 4 effects randomly after each death: 1 - Reduces Physical Defense 2 - Reduces Evasion and causes Poison and Blind. 3 - Deals 2000 fixed damage each of FIRE, LIGHT, DARK attribute. 4 - All Attributes Down for 4 turns.]
When using BP, the equipping character has a 25% chance of recovering the amount of BP used
Malice / Resentment / Malevolence (Tier 1/ Tier II / Tier III)

Tier I (Normal): Deal dark-based damage to all foes, and restore HP to all allies. The more damage you deal, the more HP you restore. Tier II (Advanced Magic): Deal dark-based damage to all foes 2 times, and restore HP to all allies. The more damage you deal, the more HP you restore. Tier III (Alephan's Wisdom): Deal dark-based damage to all foes 3 times, and restore HP to all allies. The more damage you deal, the more HP you restore.
Blessing / Benediction / Spiritual Grace (Tier 1/ Tier II / Tier III)

Tier I (Normal): Deal light-based damage to all foes, and restore SP to all allies. The more damage you deal, the more SP you restore. Tier II (Advanced Magic): Deal light-based damage to all foes 2 times, and restore SP to all allies. The more damage you deal, the more SP you restore. Tier III (Alephan's Wisdom): Deal light-based damage to all foes 3 times, and restore SP to all allies. The more damage you deal, the more SP you restore.
Extend the duration of attribute-reducing effects on all foes by 1/2/3/4 turns.) [This can be empowered by Intensity for +1 turn per boost or Alephan's for +2 turns per boost]
Extend the reach of skills that only target the user to affect all allies for 3/5/7/9 turns.
Change 1/2/3/4 attribute-reducing effect on yourself to an attribute-raising effect
Grant yourself an effect that leaves you with 1 HP when hit with an otherwise lethal attack. This effect will disappear once triggered, or after 3/5/7/9 turns
Apply reflect magic to an ally (1/2/3/4)
Make a single buff last till the end of the battle.
Upon taking damage, gain an amount of SP equivalent to 1% of damage taken
The equipping character's status effects do not disappear even when they become incapacitated
Doubles the amount of SP consumed when using magic, but increases the effect of spells
Equalizes the physical attack and elemental attack of the equipping character to whichever value is higher. This does not include attributes raised by equipment
